titles.title: American Wild Game and Livestock Protection Act
American Wild Game and Livestock Protection Act
American Wild Game and Livestock Protection Act
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to issue a final rule relating to the delisting of the gray wolf under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
American Wild Game and Livestock Protection Act
This bill requires the Department of the Interior to issue as a final rule the proposed rule titled Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Removing the Gray Wolf (Canis lupus) From the List of Endangered and Threatened Wildlife.
This bill exempts the rule from judicial review.
